name: Bouncing Bullets Saloon
description:
Puzzle game centered around a single bullet that can be picked up after being shot.

CONTROLS:

wasd/arrow keys to move

q/e to rotate in place

space to fire

r to restart level

esc for menu

CREDITS:

Code: Noah Ehrman, Brandon Lewis, and Isaac Corbrey

Art: Ben Winters, Owen Ulsh, David Harris,

Sound: Dalton Lybarger

Music from https://filmmusic.io
"Wagon Wheel" by Kevin MacLeod (https://incompetech.com)
License: CC BY (http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/)
